Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Create Sprint 10 Strategic Test Coverage Plan

Sprint 10 Planning Complete:
- Created comprehensive 18-24h plan to reach 70% coverage
- Analyzed coverage gaps: 33.36% baseline, need +36.64%
- Designed 4-phase priority-based strategy
- Identified blockers, risks, and contingency plans

Documentation Created:
- docs/SPRINT-10-COVERAGE-PLAN.md (800+ lines, comprehensive strategy)
  - Phase 1A: Auth context, Preferences context, Generate page â†’ 42%
  - Phase 1B: Jobs page, Settings page â†’ 52%
  - Phase 2: Use-websocket, History, Templates, Home pages â†’ 62%
  - Phase 3: Error boundary, Campaigns, Feature components â†’ 71%
  - Phase 4: Optional utilities and remaining components â†’ 75%

Documentation Updated:
- context/development.md - Sprint 10 status, Phase 1A goals
- docs/SPRINTS-ARCHIVE.md - Sprint 10 preview and progress tracking

Strategic Approach:
- Priority matrix: High impact, low effort first
- Test templates for consistency
- Quality standards by file type (60-95% coverage targets)
- Risk management and contingency plans
- Lessons applied from Sprint 9

Next Steps:
- Session 7 (Phase 1A): Auth context (BLOCKER) + Preferences + Generate page
- Target: 33.36% â†’ 42% coverage (+9 percentage points)
- Estimated: 4-5 hours

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Sprint 10 Phase 1A - Critical Infrastructure Tests

Phase 1A Complete - Coverage: 33.36% â†’ 39.54% (+6.18%)

Test Suites Created:
1. Auth Context Tests (34 tests)
   - 18/34 passing (53%), 78.08% coverage
   - Provider rendering and configuration tests
   - API key management (set, clear, validate)
   - localStorage persistence
   - Error handling and edge cases
   - withAuth HOC tests
   - Issues: 16 tests failing (async/act timing)

2. Preferences Context Tests (26 tests)
   - 19/26 passing (73%), 97.82% coverage
   - Provider and hook tests
   - Notification preferences CRUD
   - Filter preset management
   - Display preferences (theme, itemsPerPage)
   - localStorage persistence and cross-mount
   - Edge cases and error handling
   - Issues: 7 tests failing (reset/remount timing)

3. Generate Page Tests (35 tests)
   - 34/35 passing (97%), 100% coverage
   - Page rendering and layout tests
   - API configuration and auth integration
   - Success/error state handling
   - Navigation and redirects
   - Form integration tests
   - Help section content verification
   - Edge cases (rapid submissions, state alternation)
   - Issue: 1 test failing (rapid submission timing)

Results:
- Total Tests: 353 â†’ 448 (+95 new tests)
- Passing Tests: 311 â†’ 382 (+71)
- Test Pass Rate: 88.1% â†’ 85.3%
- Overall Coverage: 33.36% â†’ 39.54% (+6.18%)

Coverage by Area:
- Auth Context: 0% â†’ 78.08% âœ…
- Preferences Context: 0% â†’ 97.82% âœ…
- Generate Page: 0% â†’ 100% âœ…
- Overall Contexts: 37.4% â†’ 80.91% âœ…

Target vs Actual:
- Phase 1A Target: 42% coverage
- Actual Achieved: 39.54% coverage
- Gap: -2.46% (missed by small margin)

Technical Approach:
- Followed toast-context test pattern
- Comprehensive test coverage per file
- Mocked dependencies (useAuth, useRouter, API client)
- localStorage mocking for persistence tests
- userEvent for interaction testing
- waitFor for async assertions

Known Issues:
- 16 auth context tests: act() warnings on async validation
- 7 preferences tests: timing issues on reset/remount
- 1 generate page test: rapid click timing
- Total: 24/95 tests need refinement (25% failure rate)

Next Steps:
- Phase 1B: Jobs page + Settings page tests
- Target: 39.54% â†’ 50% coverage (+10-11%)
- Alternative: Fix failing tests first

Documentation:
- Updated context/development.md with Phase 1A results
- Session 7 complete

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
